          <title>
            <string language="en">Displayed formula and name of the carboxylic acid formed on oxidation of 2-methylpropan-1-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angezeigte Formel und Name der karboxylhaltigen 
Säure bildeten sich auf Oxidation von 2-methylpropan-1-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La formule et le nom affichés de l'acide 
carboxylique ont formé sur l'oxydation de 2-methylpropan-1-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fórmula e o nome indicados do ácido carboxylic
deram forma na oxidação de 2-methylpropan-1-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La formula ed il nome visualizzati dell'acido 
carbossilico hanno formato su ossidazione di 2-methylpropan-1-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιδειχθέντες τύπος και όνομα του καρβοξυλικού οξέος 
που διαμορφώνεται στην οξείδωση 2-μετχυλπροπαν-1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El fórmula y el nombre visualizados del ácido 
carboxylic formaron en la oxidación de 2-methylpropan-1-ol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the displayed formula and name of the carboxylic acid formed when 2-methylpropan-1-ol is oxidized.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">2-methylpropanoic acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxidation</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">carboxylic acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organic compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction products</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die angezeigte Formel und 
den Namen der karboxylhaltigen gebildeten Säure, wenn 
2-methylpropan-1-ol oxidiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que la formule et le nom
affichés de l'acide carboxylique ont formé quand 2-methylpropan-1-ol
est oxydé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a fórmula e o nome 
indicados do ácido carboxylic dado forma quando 2-methylpropan-1-ol 
é oxidado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formula ed il nome 
visualizzati dell'acido carbossilico formato quando 
2-methylpropan-1-ol è ossidato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει επιδειχθέντα τύπο και το 
όνομα του καρβοξυλικού οξέος διαμόρφωσε όταν οξειδώνεται 
2-μετχυλπροπαν-1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el fórmula y el 
nombre visualizados del ácido carboxylic formaron cuando se oxida 
2-methylpropan-1-ol.</string>
          </description>
